item.description: Lynn Woods is such a great place. Many trails and options. For this meet-up I am thinking of doing a 6 or so mile dirt trail - this is the main trail, and is more of a walk than a hike - that does a horseshoe from Great Woods Road to Pennybrook and back. If we get a good pace going we can probably do it in less than 2 hours, but it usually takes longer than that because the dogs usually enjoy stopping by the water along the way.
item.name: Last minute meet-up ; Lynn Woods Great Woods Road Entrance
